fields.name: Homepage
fields.bio:
The journey of my career has been anything but linear, defined by a continuous pursuit of my passions. Starting out as a mechanical engineer, I took a leap of faith that led me to the world of full-stack development. I embraced the challenges of transitioning to software engineering, diving deep into Django, and cultivating a new set of skills that would redefine my career trajectory. This shift wasn't simply a change in job titles; it was a testament to my curiosity and drive to create something meaningful.

My work in mechanical engineering, and later electro-mechanical engineering, provided me with a strong foundation in problem-solving and technical precision. But I was also seeking an outlet for my creativity, a space where technology, innovation, and imagination could coexist. I found that spark in programming and artificial intelligence. The decision to become a full-time developer for an AI-driven knowledge portal was transformative, not just for my career, but for the way I approach challenges and solutions.

One of my most enjoyable pastimes involves working on 3D printers—designing, building, upgrading, and maintaining them. These hobbies allow me to express my creative side and keep learning hands-on technical skills, even as I pivot towards the digital landscape. There's something about creating something tangible out of a digital blueprint that speaks to both the engineer and the artist within me. It's a balance that I bring into my professional life, where I aim to merge the structural discipline of engineering with the creativity of development.

Navigating the transition from engineering to software development required humility, a willingness to learn, and the courage to face the unknown. It has been a challenging but deeply rewarding process, reinvigorating my sense of creativity and reigniting my love for problem-solving. The experience has shown me the value of embracing change and pursuing my passions, even when it means stepping into uncharted territory. It has made me more adaptable and open to opportunities where I can integrate my diverse skills.

I am always interested in connecting with others who share a passion for engineering, programming, or creative innovation. I believe in the power of collaboration and in exploring how diverse disciplines can converge to create something remarkable. If my journey resonates with you, or if you'd like to explore opportunities to work together, feel free to send me a message. Let's connect and continue to push the boundaries of what technology can do.

fields.name: TFD-Bot
fields.description: A Discord bot designed for games and quotes management, offering seamless community engagement.

fields.name: Harmonic Creator
fields.description:
HarmonicCreator allows users to make various calculations based on input from different models of slats for a pool cover.

By leveraging advanced algorithms and user-friendly interfaces, HarmonicCreator simplifies the process of designing and evaluating pool covers, making it an essential tool for professionals in the industry.

fields.name: BLT-MusicBot
fields.description:
A Discord bot that plays radio streams, bringing music and entertainment to your server.

BLT-MusicBot

fields.name: Project Hermes
fields.description:
Hermes is a project in development designed to facilitate real-time collaboration on markdown files. It enables users within an organization to work together seamlessly, ensuring that everyone is on the same page.

With Hermes, team members can edit, comment, and sync their changes instantly, making it easier to manage and share information efficiently. This tool is particularly useful for teams that need to maintain up-to-date documentation, share knowledge, and enhance overall productivity through effective communication and collaboration.

fields.name: PDM Portal
fields.description:
The PDM Portal is designed to be a dynamic, all-encompassing platform connecting colleagues, enabling seamless skill development, and facilitating efficient resource allocation across the organization.

This is an ongoing project for PDM Industrial Excellence.

* This project is closed source *
